document.full_text: senator john ensign's actions were so brazen and improper that had he not resigned last week he might have been the first senator expelled in nearly 150 years, said the ethics committee chairwoman.
document.title: report urges u.s. to consider charging ensign
lines_and_colors: senator john ensign's actions were so brazen and improper that had he not resigned last week he might have been the first senator expelled in nearly 150 years, said the ethics committee chairwoman.
